title: About Joshua
text: Joshua is a fresh graduate IT focused on Frontend and React. Skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, basic Node/Express. Familiar with Supabase and MongoDB. He builds responsive websites and simple full-stack apps.

title: Services Joshua can offer
text: Services: build responsive websites (landing pages, portfolios), React UI development, admin dashboards, API integration, authentication (basic), CRUD apps, performance and UI improvements, bug fixing, deploy to Vercel.

title: Project: Chat App
text: Chat app using React UI with user list, messaging UI, and basic CRUD. Focus: clean UI, state management, and component structure.

title: Availability
text: Joshua is open for junior frontend roles and freelance small projects. Preferred: clear requirements, simple milestones, and regular updates.

title: Contact
text: Contact Joshua via WhatsApp or email from the website contact section.
